item.title: MU
item.description: score:-1 Chances: Wall Street expects these two chip stocks to capitalize on AI adoption along with Nvidia, and they are trading at attractive levels right now. TSMC, AMD, and Micron are still great long-term investments. AI chip stocks are on a tear amid investor optimism.
